body: This has been updated with all feedback so far. I've added additional component tests for the console-log form and show-heartbeat forms. Testing the remaining functionality on the RecipeForm component is a little tricky right now. See my struggles here: https://twitter.com/brittanystoroz/status/738714184624525312 Looking into solutions but might never find one ¯_(ツ)_/¯
